name: Bonescythe Legplates
tooltip:
Bonescythe LegplatesLevel 60

Rohan the Assassin at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Bonescythe Legplates if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Legplates, 20 Wartorn Leather Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar, 8 Cured Rugged Hides and 100 gold pieces.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Legplates
- Wartorn Leather Scrap x 20
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 8
- Money:100
